title: Hextech Crafting- Refund points as a part of the Cosmetic Essence
body: With Hextech Chests in PBE (More info found here: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html ) I was wondering if it would be a good idea to include Refund Points as part of a possible Cosmetic Essence reward? I know it's not a big deal to most people (especially those who never regret what they purchase in which case, lucky ;-;) but I wasted my three points back in Season 2 when I had no idea how this game worked! It'd be amazing if summoners could some how earn one or two a season? What does everyone else think? :)
